This is the sixth header: Equation(s)

In early education, students learn the Pythagorean Thereom: \[(a^2 + b^2 = c^2)\] in their math course. [1]

The following book is about a programming language used in data science by Wickham, Hadley and Cetinkaya-Rundel, Mine and Grolemund, Garrett R for data science [2]
